## Source: ossf-package-analysis (9171e1f45949cd59393734f876163a3c733648e1cd2598d391c62832196eb7bf)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'fc-clip' @ 99.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
